main event: A civilian reported seeing a bright object that broke into 6-8 pieces and descended rapidly in Highland Park, California on August 3, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed for several minutes before breaking apart,The witness was at Starlight Grill when making the observation,The object was estimated to be 34 to 38 degrees above the horizon,The witness was uncertain about the nature of the object,Another sighting was mentioned from 1/22/52 in the same area.
sighted object: bright object that broke into pieces
